title: I got chat blocked for calling lane?
body:
Why is this a thing? 

is riot hating on norms now?

replies.body: What's worse is when you call a lane and you get blocked, then someone else joins late and calls the same lane and thinks they got it. Holy shit have I experienced that heaps of times.
Once is enough. Unless you've mistyped.
I don't spam, I only call one and call again if I see another notification of someone joining the room. I think I forgot to mention that.

> [{quoted}](name=kJs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=M4gs2tMV,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-06-11T08:00:27.040+0000)
>
> Once is enough. Unless you've mistyped.

read above comment

Its something they recently implemented to prevent spam, specifically from people advertising. Basically, you have to wait a couple of seconds after you type. Mostly happens for me post game chat lobby though.

> [{quoted}](name=Fndrr22dxd,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=M4gs2tMV,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-06-10T08:40:34.335+0000)
>
> Its something they recently implemented to prevent spam, specifically from people advertising. Basically, you have to wait a couple of seconds after you type. Mostly happens for me post game chat lobby though.

It's not functional at all, many times i have missed a lane and not be able to call a backup one because of this issue
Never had this issue, it seems like I am the only one who can call any lane I want now huehuehue
Can confirm, I have this issue as well. I call lane before i connect and I get blocked by chat and in the end it's blocked before I call lane. Rito pls fix
its a retardedly op bug that needs fixing. I love connecting and not being able to call lane.
